data.text: It's a pretty good platform game and has a lot to offer for free. It has really everything for all ages of people and brings a lot of ideas to the table. However, even though this is the simpler version of Roblox, there's a lot less to experience. Like how mobile players have a limited customization variation for the avatar editor, or less buttons to work with, bad screen crunch and not being able to edit and make games entirely. But if you are able to look past these issues, it's great.

Amazing. It has zero ads, a gazzilion games, and just awesome! So many customization options, and even free items if your cheap. Only complaint I could possibly have is it only works well if you have internet. It works without it, but is super laggy and long loads. But that was expected. Awesome one-stop shop for games! ABSOLUTELY RECOMMEND!!!!

Great game. It's fun, but there are so many lags. I join a game, and I immediately get disconnected. It takes me about 7 attempts or more to get into the game I want to play, and it takes numerous attempts to even stay connected and I know it is not my internet because I have a full connection. Second, when an item becomes unavailable and you can't wear it, roblox sends a message to your inbox to redeem lost credit, but when I got one, my robux never came back to me, and it's been over 2 months.

One app with a wide variety of games to choose from, has no lag or issues. If you have a kid, definitely recommend it if he/she is above the age of 9. ALSO! 1 small bug I've noticed recently that has been happening is that people's screens are freezing/can't be moved, don't worry, I found a solution! Click the Roblox icon on the top left of your screen (when in a game) and then exit out of the menu and now your screen can move! (if your camera doesn't move at all)

Great app, but there's some issues I'd like to discuss: All hats were, for some reason, just changed to a minimum price of 65 robux? That's almost a dollar per cheapest hat accessory. When looking at Roblox Catalog/Marketplace on mobile, there's no filter for classic clothing. This causes the search results to come up with all 3D models, even when I type in the exact title of a classic shirt. I'm happy with the games, just wanted to bring attention to these issues.

Great game! I used to play it all the time. But after I logged out of one of my accounts to play on my other account I could not log back in. I thought maybe I was entering the wrong password, and forgot it. But when I tried to do the Forgot Password thing, I never received an Email for it. I did this multiple times and never did. And I was using my email I use for almost evevery thing so it couldn't have been the non-existing email to cause this. Still a great game, and love the game choices!

I think this game is amazing. I prefer the Roll plays and hide and seek game best though. For some games I would also not like how they update frequently beaucse sometimes the animatons change witch makes me not like the game as much. I only like update for fixing bugs and other types of technol issues. Hope you like this game just as much as I do! --UltraGca

I love the games but they are glitchy from time to time I've played Roblox since I was 5yrs old and I find it a fun game this game is perfect for people who love adventures,action and mischief but whenever I play flee the facility, I run into the problem of not being able to see the menu or my inventory, please fix this problem! and in Brookhaven I find myself being kicked out of the whole game and it annoys me a lot, only problem with this game in my opinion though!

Game is awesome! But here's a problem I have.. moderation is kinda bad, whenever I want to do something 2 step verification is everywhere, (also i sometimes don't get the code) and.. blocking method doesn't really work. Whenever you block someone and you have a group, they can still interact with you. The game is great overall!

I like the game, but the only thing I don't like is how in some high quality games, if your on mobile you can get kicked out of the app, and sometimes in low quality games, it happens even when you lower the graphics. It gets very annoying when I'm trying to play games I like. Please at LEAST fix this issue or I'm starting to think this app is only stable on PC...

I've had other things before to say. Recently, I've noticed that even if you get something really good or lucky, you'll never get to enjoy it unless it saves via disconnect. I know this because I roll a temporary huge luck boost that DOESN'T save when you leave, and even when I had max wifi, it still gave the Internet disconnected. Why?

One app with over a million games, I've been having Roblox since 2019, and I have enjoyed every single second of it. The only problem that I have is the servers. They mostly crash when popular games get updates or when theres a live event. But everything else is wonderful, Can't wait to see the future of this game and hiw it turns out at the end.

I love the app, but it is really glitchy and I try to play it on many different devices but it never works, there is always something wrong or something won't show up. Other than that it is really fun and I don't regret spending my money on it. There are many games to choose from and you are destined to find one you love. Would recomend for people of 6 and up. Just make sure you do your research on what devices can support roblox, otherwise it can glitch so bad it will ruin your device.

Sometimes it just shuts down for no reason, but most of the time it's fun to play and connect with others. However, it can also be very annoying and it also takes a while to load. Multiple times I have tried to open the app and it acts like it's about to, but then it closes less than a second after I clicked "open" on the Play Store. If this gets fixed, I would give it a higher rating.

So, I know it's an occuring issue for everyone, Roblox being a great game and all but not that great for Chromebooks. I've tried to fix the lag and crashing issue many times and the only recommendation I have to at least try and help is check to see if you can update Roblox everyday, update it as soon as you can. It sort of helps, and also when joining a game don't touch anything till everything is just about fully loaded in, it will still lag but it gives you a higher chance of playing.

Not bad, A few bug fixes are needed and such, but not bad. Games are great and there is plenty too play. So many choices for our avatars, well made games, we can play with friends, chat, but the chat log need fixed for real. I can't count too 10 without the tags. And that really sucks when your playing hide and seek in a different game. It also is annoying when I play for a long while, I get kicked out of the entire platform. It probably is just my device but it's annoying. Overall good game.

I used to absolutely love this game until the minimum price for items in the marketplace got raised. I used to spend maybe like 200 or 300 for a bunch of accessories, but now it's much harder and much more discouraging to make nice avatars since even face accessories are so expensive. Everything else is mostly fine. I just wish it wasn't so expensive :(

I love roblox a lot. It's just one app with a wide variety of games. But there are some bugs especially for mobile players like me. 1. If you're Off the app for under 20 seconds and it doesn't kick you off whatever game you're playing, it's gonna be laggy. If it is just click on the roblox menu in the top left corner and then exit out of the menu and you're problems fixed. However if the game kicks you off it's that laggy, I don't have a solution but that's the only help I can give. I recommen

Roblox is great, I've met a lot of people and played a ton of games. But I have a few issues. First, half the time, I'm not told when I need an update, and sometimes the screen gets bugged out and won't move. Also, I HATE how the moderation team is useless! This has been an issue for a long time. Also, stop telling roblox to fix the lag, they CANNOT fix that! That's your problem, not theirs! Get better internet or a better phone. Overall, it's a great game, just a few bugs.

It is a great game to play but their is only one major problem. When I play a game on Roblox, it occasionally freezes for about 5-10 seconds before randomly crashing. It gets kinda annoying when it happens but maybe it's the device I'm using... Overall it's a great game. 👍

This app is decent on my phone and on my xbox, but chromebook is a completely different story. On chromebook, the quality sucks, and you can't even scroll in the home page. It also only worked for a few weeks, and after that it wasn't even able to get past the loading screen before crashing. I've had this computer for a little over a year, and I've tried restarting it, system resetting, and everything. I eventually realized that updating could help, but it didn't fix anything.

AMAZING GAME!! So many ways to customize your avatar, you can make lifelong friends, and even play with loved ones! One minor issue is that it's crashing my computer sometimes. That however is on me for having a horrible quality computer. 😂 If you have a low quality device, turn your graphics down when it starts to freeze up before its too late! You can meet up with friends and talk in voice, or in the public chat! Overall, this is a 9.9/10 game for me! Just crashes my game sometimes. XD

The game is great, it works good for me obviously it's slow sometimes but I really don't have a big problem with any glitching but the refunds lack, like.. I'll buy a outfit but it will just disappear a few days later, I'm pretty sure that happens when they remove the outfit from the market but either way I keep spending money on these outfits and they keep disappearing without giving me a refund like it used to do, I've had this problem for a while now but it's really starting to get annoying..

The experiences are awesome, but as soon as I try to log out, and log back in, it won't let me. Even if I have the right password, it won't let me in. I try again, and again, changing my password, putting in my phone number, putting in my email, only to find no progress. So each time I want to log in, I have to use quick login which, I'm not always able to do. Overall, Roblox Corperation, does well. Please fix this error.

I really love this game! You can make friends, play different cool games, and more! But... one problem... IT WONT LET ME PLAY ANY GAMES!😭 I went to settings and checked on something, but when I was going to play a game... it wouldn't let me join! I don't know if I pressed something in setting... but just please check to make sure this isn't like a bug or glitch... thank you, and keep up the good work!

Great game. I've been playing for almost 3 years now and don't plan on deleting it any time soon. I recently switched schools and still stay in touch with a great deal of my friends through roblox. One bug I'm having though is when I leave a game, it makes me rejoin right after. No matter what I do, it doesn't stop. If this happens to anyone else, idk what to tell you.😐 But definitely worth getting if you haven't already! 5 stars most definitely!

Roblox is a very immersive game with millions of games to play! You can make friends, play with them, talk to people, and customize your avatar endlessly! The possibilities are seemingly endless. When it wants to work. I have an average internet connection, and it freezes my favorite game a lot. There's the mobile glitch with the un-movable screen, which is very annoying. And even if I dont don't have max friends, I won't recieve a request. Please fix this. When it runs smoothly its amazing

Personally, I like the amount of games on Roblox and how everyone can make their own. But what really irritates me is the inconvenient placement of the jump button on mobile, specifically phone. Because it's small and tucked away in the bottom right corner, it's hard to tap on it the first time, which is especially annoying in parkour. And don't get me started with the auto rotate. It also makes it really hard to do parkour and throws off focus. I'd recommend adding settings to fix those issues.

It is a great game, but i dont like the controls on laptop. I love the simulations on my xbox. Xbox is very simple controls, i like that. There is a LOT of glitches[not so good if you ask me]. But simply i give it a four because there a not a lot of scams on roblox. Overall, it is a great game.

A renowned game to meet friends, make games, and pave a path for yourself! There is no predetermined course or story to go by, you decide what to play, what to make, and what to enjoy. The only limit is your imagination, ROBLOX is definitely the platformer for any age to just get away from the stresses of everyday life and enjoy one's self for a change. I highly recommend downloading ROBLOX and making an account, there is so much to do, and so much to uncover! Don't take my word for it!

As someone who has played since 2016 and mainky plays on mobile, the app does not function. It has so many bugs. It'll get stuck on the main screen and I have to exit and reopen the app. In game, my abiliy to move the screen will freeze and I have to go to the settings and then close it for it to work. The worst part of the app is the CATALOOGG. I buy from roblox alot because I love customizing my avatar but god is the customization BAD. So many users use mobile, PLEASE fix the dang app.

The gameplay has been extremely buggy since the latest event. I have to reset my character often or even the app when that doesn't work. Clothes, buildings, scenery, characters, etc. disappear. The event lags a lot. I often get stuck in spaces that disappear and reset don't work. Love the game, but it's hard to play when the gameplay itself is so buggy.

It is a game full of games, you can chose which game to play, but be careful, E daters are everywhere (unless you are a weird person who- nevermind). Anyways, Roblox is a great game full of -mostly- great people. AND THE BEST PART, FASHION. Being the most fashionable faction ks great but take it from what i've seen, don't buy headless, it's not worth it, it costs too much, and it's kind of a thing of 2023 at this point. But even with that said, BACONS RULE, and Roblox is great -Spy

This game is really amazing! I love how you can customize avatars, create games, create shirts, pants, accessorys, and play lots of games! But the issue is that it is really slow for me and laggy and it's always glitching when I play. It's really hard for me to play like that but PC it's fast graphics a little bad but I like how you can customize settings in games like. Volume, graphics, how to move. But Roblox please fix the issue with the lagging and stuff but overall it's a great game!

I love this game! It's so good! I love the customization of your avatar, and everything! The only thing I wanna recommend, is a offline mode. It might be hard for games with RNG, But I think it's doable! Please add this feature, thank you. Also, Roblox kinda runs bad when playing it, it always takes a bit of time for the game to load and it can get annoying, but it might be because I play on mobile, but, overall, great game.

This app is great. It has all sorts of different games inside of the app and it doesn't take up that much space on my phone. The only problem I have is sometimes it will glitch me out and then I get kicked out of my game and it gets really frustrating a lot of the time. Thankfully it doesn't happen to often but it still bugs me when it does happen. Otherwise this game is awesome and a lot of my friends and family use it and it is very very fun. So if you are looking for a new game download this

i am pretty sure that everyone loves the game! u can play it on many devices, and it has many games inside of the app but the reason i rated it 4/5 was because some times the game never lets me in, a lot of lags, inapropriate people and if i go to get something or have to go to the rest room my screen is frozen and i can't do anything!

Despite some of "the" players, roblox really is a great game. Although bugs do happen & need fixing, It's not frequently to where I wouldn't give 4+ stars (or at least on my experience) & I use mobile, which surprisingly 90% of the time works fine. I do kinda wish there could be more of a friend limit than just 200, but it's alright. Overall, the game itself is amazing. Many different options of games, making an avatar with many choices, and more. I highly recommend trying it out.

It has so many games and choices! you can play and never get bored! The only bad thing abt this is the lag. In certain games, its just really laggy And, im a mobile user and i really want to make games on my tablet! The second thing is whenever i cusomize my avatar in the customization, its soo laggy! when i try to put on my charaters that i save, it just lags! Thats the feedback. Otherwise, i really recommend!

Edit2: the previous problem stopped, but me and many of my friends find it difficult to join games easily, it's not the internet, but we have to join specific servers to actually join the game. Not sure if this is just for hand-held devices, but it's annoying sometimes, it takes so long to load when I don't join a server that I have to swipe up the app to join another server. Roblox, if you can figure out how to fix this you guys get 6 stars, but for now, only five stars.

This game isn't necessarily bad, but it could use improvements. Me and many mobile players have to deal with a lot of problems such as lag, glitches, avatar issues, etc. You also can't make avatar items, games, or development items on mobile. The moderation system isn't good either. There are many good things about this game though, despite all my criticism. You can be creative, have fun; with friends or yourself, and much more. But, I don't really think this deserves a high rating. Three stars.

This is an AWESOME game, but I recently found a problem. If I am reading somthing in a game, or I go to get a snack, I will come back and my screen is FROZEN. I can't scroll, or move, or ANYTHING, so I have to close the app and sometimes reset my Cromebook. I don't have any other problems with the game, but I play on Chrome so this might not happen to everyone. PLEASE fix this!!

This game is really fun! Just a few problems. Super fun on my phone but on a chromebook it lags really badly and takes so long to load. It also feels like the device you're using is going to blow up. It gets so hot! And Roblox also drains your battery REALLY badly. Another thing that can be annoying is you have to have really good wifi to play. And sometimes it will just randomly kick me off mid game. But other than that Roblox can be really fun and entertaining!

THE MOST AWESOME APP EVER! There is always something fun to do when I'm bored. I can search through several categories and find just the right game to cure my boredom. This removed all my stresses as I played a game someone made just for that! There are so many games, codes, and so many clothing items to choose from. There are countless adventures u can make, and u can also make amazing friends! Warning: Be careful with who u choose to be your friend! U can even choose ur own display/user name!!

This game has been fun over the years, especially during Covid! It's super interactive and there's so many options of games to try out. They added voice-chat and this has recently opened up positive and negative outcomes. The positive outcome is that ability to talk with others in voice instead of typing. For instance, in horror games you wouldn't want to type while you're running away from a monster. A negative affect is that a lot of underage children lie about their age and are annoying.

It's a very great game! you can make friends, hang out, and play different experiences! I love how this game is growing more and more. However, there's a bit of a problem. When I try to get on, It would say, "Connection error" and every time I try to retry, it would do the same thing again. I checked my wifi many times and still didn't work. I would like this to be fixed, please. Still a great game!

Could be better. They should add settings for low graphics for lower end devices. I try to play a game but its too laggy, try to change the graphics and it barely does anything. Plus the controls on mobile should be close but not to close to the edge of the screen and make them customizable. These changes could probably make roblox more accessible for many people with lower end devices or with tablets.

It's a great game, lots of different choices, but has been broken for my mobile device lately. It's usally laggy (although that's just my phone), but lately on about half the games I play the screen is broken. It stays upward instead of sideways so everything is stretched out and the controls are all werid. I'm not sure if I'm joining games for mobile only and that's why or if it's something else, but one of my favorite games I know is for mobile also has this problem. Please fix it if possible

AMAZING! props to the devs and even the owner who passed away. This game has a wide variety of so many games, and each one is unique and is apealing to different ages. Although there's alot of problems with these modern and disgusting people on this game which brought the game from E for everyone to teen, This is concerning considering that the game used to have no problems. I've been playing since 2017 and things have changed. Things that shouldn't have been changed. Overall I'll still play it

I LOVE THIS GAME although there could be some fixes. Like how if u have the same acount on mobile and on chrome, in games it shouldn't change the settings like for me in mm2 I play on mobile and and Chrome and I have to choose tablet bc it's the closest to computer. Another problem is how it lages so much when I have full bars. A final fix is that in like in games like berry av, all you the dress up things gotten changed ugly. As you can see I think these fixes should be recognized for starters.

data.userName: that plague doctor in your attic
data.text: Used to be a great gaming experience. It could be a little laggy, though that may be just because of my device. However, in recent times whenever I try to open the app it never leaves the loading screen. I can have perfect wifi and it still won't work. I make sure to update it when necessary and I'm not sure how to fix the problem. There's probably nothing I can do about it, but I'm giving this a 2-star rating nontheless. Hope it fixes itself eventually.

I play on chromebook. all of the games i join all think i'm on mobile since this is the android app. My mouse cursor won't lock so if i turn too much in first person my cursor hits the edge of the screen i can't turn anymore, so in most games i can't even turn 360 degrees. Shiftlock is also non existent and overall playing on chromebook gives me a huge disadvantage to competitive games. It's a great game but DO NOT PLAY ON CHROMEBOOK.

It is amazing although sometimes it lags it is really fun to play with friends and family. There is one slight problem, this problem is how I buy an outfit and a few days later it gets deleted. If this could be fixed it would be amazing but I am pretty sure it's because the creaters that make the outfits delete them. I wish if the outfits did get deleted we would get a refund because I spent over 3k robux on an outfit and it got deleted this is just one problem I have with the game But it's fun.

You get all fun experiences and games to play! Its an awesome place to play with your friends and learn some new people. Its great for kids because it blocks out innapropriate things. Yes it sometimes gets annoying because some things arent innaporpiate but it still blocks them out but other than that it is an awesome plae to explore new games and have fun with friends!

Overall Roblox is a good game but it is not good on Chromebook because the quality is bad. I can't scroll on the home page, and I get very laggy on this chromebook. I have major problems with it. Whenever I play a game, and I try to type something in the chat. My game froze and I can't move. It needs to be fixed. I agree with the other people who rated it 2 stars or something. Please fix your game.

Great game, as an online game the lag spikes are occasional but other than that it's good and sturdy. One thing is bugging me. Everytime I edit or customize my avatar, it's nothing but a grey screen where my profile pic is. Update: The grey screen is occasional but the game is still laggy especially on a well populated game like ERLC (Emergency Response Liberty County).

Game options are great. Cool 2 c other players zoom by. 2 BIG issues, though: 1. controls are a nightmare. Camera view is bad. Angles move around on their own; will get stuck bet walls unable to move. Camera stabilization is unsteady, hard to move the character. Second issue is there are no instructions. Each game is different but leaves u in a state of confusion when u enter; unsure of what 2 do. Each game needs menu options that include a guide on how 2 play; integrated into games themselves.

This game is quite great honestly. Although there are some bugs in the game that would kick you out of the entire app. Like in Royale high, when you try to teleport somewhere, you just get kicked out. Also, in high-quality games, when you simply enter the game for like 2 seconds, it would just kick you out. Sometimes when your playing a survival game on a chromebook, you can't do certain controls because the system automatically thinks your on a mobile device. I find that extremely annoying.

kind of disappointing, but i still like it. I've been playing this for 4 years. theres some issues that made me give 4 star. first, when you trying to leave. you will rejoin the game if you leave the game (theres a time that the game will automatically join the game for you back). and that bug is kind of annoying. especially for mobile users. and, the robux issue. i dont like to bring this up but the items suddenly become overpriced. the avatar appearance in the game too. it only will be grey.

I love this app with my whole heart, I've had it for years and it works perfecty on every other device i own. However like almost every other review here states, the app just is'nt functional for chromebooks. The app can barely open nevermind the struggle it takes to get into a game. And if your lucky enough to get into a server, it lags like crazy and within maybe 5 minutes at the most your game will crash and your thrown back to the home page. I have no idea why this is but please fix it.

This game is great, literally is my childhood, plus it's a nice place to also socialize with people. Ever since I've started playing it, i can tell that it's a really nice game for people at all ages. The only two things i can tell is that you should...fix the reporting a little: i mean, there's a lot of mean people out there in most games, but when you report them, it just doesn't work. The second one is the jump button problem: it's just that I'd like for the button change scale feature.

Overall roblox is the best game I know but, there are many bugs such as, sometimes when I join it doesn't let me move my avatar or sometimes my screen too! It's also annoying that you have to pay for so many things. Even if I just want to play a game like Bloxburg, there's a barbie house game (I don't remember the name) etc. But my wish is that you fix the bugs.

Really good, but you get bullied a lot. But besides that really Fun. So many different types of games for so many different types of people. The only thing I don't like is. If you jump when you die and start jumping. After you revived And then you have to close the game and restart your phone to get back on. I Love it. Really good to keep kids Entertainment. Together Addictive?

A great game. You can play various amount of games in Roblox and interact with people. Although there has been a couple of problems I encountered. One of them being the fact that i can't past the Roblox loading screen after updating Roblox. This has happened a couple of times before and I'm not sure if it's only happening on my device. I had to reinstall them a couple of times just to get past the loading screen. At this point I might as well uninstall then reinstall Roblox instead of updating.

Very nice and fun game to play overall, but I'm rating it 4 stars because of two things, 1. There's this glitch that happens on mobile that at a point, you won't be able to rotate your camera and when you try it would just be zooming in and out, as well as moving very sensitively while you're only touching joystick, and 2. Please add a shift lock option for mobile

Roblox is an amazing game! I have played it since 2020 and it was my favorite game ever! It doesn't really have much bugs but overall good! You can dress up your avatar, but you will need robux! You can add friends! Play different types of games. But I'm also saying to the ones who say that there are bugs. There are no bugs, its your phones version or your phone doesn't have much space, most problems are on phones, so I recommend playing on PC/Laptop/Mac etc. Roblox is very fun to play.

Roblox is so fun! there is almost a different game for every interest but there are a couple issues/glitches like it randomly disconnects you like in some games while your trading,doing an obey with no check point and you are about to finish also it randomly goes black and then disconnect you or it goes black and you think it is about to disconnect and then you leave but 1 second before you close it it goes back to normal I hope this review is hepful

This game is amazing and it's even better because it has no ads! I've been playing a lot oftentimes and it's my favourite game so far. But there are a few of bugs in it. First: In mobile, the game crashes if I join a game. I hate this bug so much and after I re-open the game (Roblox) it won't open and say "Please check your Internet connection" even though my Internet is perfectly fine. Second: the jump button is either too small or not even there. But imo, It's an amazing game. ^^

Ok, don't get me wrong, Roblox is a terrific game where we can connect and get a diversity and make friends. For mobile and ipads and some users have been difficult. The jump button is the one and only problem. It's sometimes to small and i always click on the right and then I fall down after such a long way. Like I wish I could customize the jump button a little bigger it would make my life with obbies and towers and other people a lilttle better. I hope that gets added in future updates.

Roblox, go fix an extremely annoying problem on mobile, it's getting me furious, the problem is the unexpected client behavior kick, I keep getting kicked and no matter what I do, there is only one solution and that needs a whole lot of effort and wastes your time. I'm getting so mad, just please fix it this instant. It's been so long and this still STILL HASN'T BEEN FIXED! It seems that you don't even care at all, WE'VE BEEN WAITING LONG ENOUGH!

Roblox has been one of my favorite games to play and probably all time fav.... I don't know why this issue has been occuring but whenever I try to play a game, after a few minutes or seconds it disconnects me when my wifi is completely stable. It's been making my experience on this game feel a little boring and this bug is actually quite agitating. My wi-fi is fine, my internet is fine but it just randombly disconnects me and it makes me kinda mad. It would be great if you guys fixed it <:))

This game brings joy to me and my 6 other siblings. I just want to play this every single second!! I highly recommend this game but something very annoying is that it glitches a lot and I have seen many complaints about glitches! Something else is that we are very upset because you are removing classic faces and replacing them with dynamic ones!!!! Please keep the classic faces! They are nice even though you want roblox more realistic just keep the faces and add the blinking ones. Love it tho!!

I love this game so much! i used to play alot of roblox games for entertainment and have fun, but there is a bug that keeps happening on my phone. My screen keeps on glitching, for example, the screen was completely paralyzed and i couldn't move or fix it. The only option is to leave the game, then the glitch happens again at a random time. Why i rated 3 stars? It's because my screen keeps freezing. please reconsider to fix it, it irritates me. Thank you!

I really love the game!! Like really!! It was good frfr but when it comes to updating the app it doesn't even let me. I have to uninstall it and reenacted it just to work. It's quite hard because sometimes I lose my own account or my friends there. It's just really annoying even tho my storage clearly isnt full. I find it annoying and I once cried about it too. roblox FIX THIS PROBLEM

Amazing game , it's my favourite. But there are 2 problems. Sometimes ( a lot of times) when if we move and click the settings button at the same time, the camera goes the way the joystick moves. Another issue is that sometimes after entering a game, we can only zoom in or out but not move. This problem only occurs on tablets, phones etc. . Please fix this!

This game is very fun! You can play various games, make new friends and interact with other players. I had a great experience playing this game so far but I'm rating it 4 stars because of one bug. Sometimes when Im playing a game, the screen will suddenly pause which makes me unable to move the cursor and I'll suddenly log out from the game. It's honestly very frustrating and I hope you can fix this. Thanks!

Roblox is an amazing game but could use a few improvements. One example is that when playing on mobile, the jump button is insanely small so if you need press it quickly to jump to another platform, you just fall and lose your progress. This has happened to me many times on mobile. If this was fixed I would definitely rate this game a 5 because it is ad free, has multi-player and single player games and has lots of great games to chose from. Definitely recommend.

This is a very very good game and it so unbored to play there's alot of games to experience with and I do like the fighting games, horror games, adventure games. This is the most good game I've ever played.. Also people that don't know how to get back when they "restarted, updated, installed" if you installed just put your birth, user, password. If you updated put the same user, password to log back. That's all

So,this game is very good but there are bugs. So the first bug (the first I've ever experienced) is where it just keeps jumping,the second is where it just walks in one direction,annoying but helpful for very long maps,the thirds is where is people levitate for no reason,idk why,and now we got the one where when i text,the characters don't show up,the 5th is where i can't rotate my camera,extremely annoying and time-wasting but easily fixed,final one is where i randomly get flung around

The game is really nice I would say, but there's one teeny tiny problem about the random popup that keeps on talking about my connection being bad, I keep double checking my internet and it seems to be fine. I also see the backround of the game still working and running properly, it's really bothering me cause I just wanna play the dang game. Hopefully it gets fixed soon.

I personally would say this game is 10/10, but here are my daily problems: 1. Kicked unexpectedly due to cheat or hacking (Experienced this many times especially when unstable network). 2. Unexpected log-out (Everytime I quit playing I have to log-in again because it always log-out.) 3. Toxicity of players, more over in everygame played, hope fix... Thanks.

Since they fixed the bug it has ran so smoothly. It is a great platform to connect with friends and enjoy your gameplay in every way. One thing I would like to request is, please make the size and position of jump button customizable on mobile. Just imagine, you are playing tower of hell, you are on the last stage, time is almost up, and the jump button doesn't click. You fall all the way back down. This has actually happened to me and I was devastated because I have never reached the top before

It's not bad at all but in my opinion, it could provide a better experience. In terms of gameplay, it's ok but sometimes if you exit the app, you end up with a camera malfunction where you can't move it at all or it simply crashes while joining certain games (the crashing part might be because my phone isn't the best but it is understandable). The buttons are also kind of small but with time you get used to it yet would love to get to customize them to my liking.

I love the game itself it's just that all the new updates and features have been much harder to control and can't see the games's thumbnails anymore. There are SO MANY bugs in the catalog marketplace. For example, if I set the price and close the category section and change another thing I can't and then I can't click any more buttons and I have to restart the whole app. I would love if the old controls were still there. It was much, much more easier to work with, but appreciate your hard work.

It's good, but can a developer make a free hair? I'm tired of those free hairs, oh and. If your screen gets freezed or whenever you move it moves with you, just go to the Roblox logo, click the resume and done! Sometimes the moving screen and moving character doesn't work with the resume button, soo.. You have to leave, that's all the tips I got! Oh and, don't hate me for this. Good luck! Thanks again for reading and understanding.

It's an awesome game. I love it, except the lag, even with proper WiFi. The game still lags in some cases. You have to fix this. Also, there is a phone glitch. The game needs to be horizontal, but instead, it's sometimes vertical. You NEED to fix this! But I'll rate this game 5 stars anyway. It's absolutely awesome, and I think you should keep up the good work and spread the game to bring smiles across the world!🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 (FIX THOSE [AND DELETE STITCH FACE] GLITCHESSSS)

Beautiful! I love how the Roblox interface looks! Wonderful! And, also an improvement, please fix the joystick cuz sometimes when you use the screen too much, when you move, the joystick acts like you look up when you move forward then if you move backward, you look down. Please fix this! But I still love this gaming platform. It is perfect! Bye!!

This app is very cool, I love it. Although I find it hard to find exciting games to play, the mimic is something I'll never quit for sure. It's my favourite, and I appreciate for you guys making such an app. Although some bugs need to to be fixed, for example the loading screen never loads when I enter the app or when I'm joining a game, I have to rejoin it. Most of the bugs lie on the developers, so that's why I'm giving it 5 stars. One last problem: please make robux less expensive PLEASE🙏

Roblox is pretty cool, for the most part. But sometimes the app won't let me in because of "Unable to access servers. Please check your internet." despite having a very stable connection and the servers were good. Another thing I wanna address is that I lag in the game despite having a stable internet connection! And then I crash for some reason! Nothing else to say really but I'll do admit this game is pretty awesome, but the bugs are pretty annoying.

Roblox is amazing but on chromebook there is a few issues: When you type to a friend or a stranger and send it all of a sudden you cant move unless you press an arrow key or the TAB button, Also the game crashes alot and says your internet is poor or my internet isn't connected. Also if chromebook didn't refer as a mobile in Roblox it would be better than great.

Well it's a nice game but it's hard to get robux in the game and also it's lagging sometimes too much.moreover, sometimes I'm in the middle of a game when suddenly the whole game turns off (Including the whole Roblox)! I don't know if it's a problem with my divice or with Roblox. I hope it is fixable and if yes, please let me know! Totally recommend otherwise!

I'm 16 about to turn 17 but I still enjoy the game a lot especially the AFK ones , look it's amazing to play , if you get bored take a break , I'm grinding like hell in a lot of simulators and have completed almost all the top tycoons 😄😄good luck gamers 👍👍. The best part you can play with your friends whenever you want , I made a lot of friends , great platform to connect with people and a lot more . So jump in to see the rest , see ya'.

Wow no other words for it but wow. It is a no ad game too. Also it sometimes goes in and out and glitches but that is quite rare. If you are outside and don't have mobile data then it will say connection error. But overall it is an amazing game and I would have given it a 4 and a half. The game is outstanding and you will rarely ever get bored!

The game is great and stuff, but sometimes it would lag or bugged like, not able to click the play button (on phone/tablet) and when I enabled my VC in the settings, it keeps making me leave the app. Not only that, sometimes the avatar would change skin color when you click one of your outfit, but you have different skin tone on. It would make your outfits the skintone your using. (Yes it is confusing) Although I enjoy the game.

for the past 4-ish years of playing roblox (on phone), ive encountered few bugs, and glitches, mainly to the "menu camera glitch", in which if you accidently click the menu while still holding your camera, it bugs and either makes you zoom in/out or freeze (except for follow camera option, in which you cant move the camera) this bug still existed for a couple years (maybe even longer) and could have been a problem since the older years, and yes, i wrote an entire essay to just report 1 bug.

Its an amazing work. The screen froze bug is no longer there. Thanks for the company concern. But im aware, theres a still bug hanging around after the update. Still. Some of them are like, The roblox new UI. Its cool. But theres a game that haven't updated and the ui button literally blocks it. (happens in Tab n phone, etc...) and that's kind of annoying. The avatar shop, too. Its so buggy that i cant even save my avatar like my current one. You just have to create it again. pls fix this asap:)

its ok honestly, but i cant really play with mouse. it like doesnt let me move the camera compleatly, it stays put when im on the edge of the screen. I can play on touch screen but where the fun in that? just download it your phone or tablet. If you fix the problem about the mouse having problems moving the camera, i might give it a higher rating.

Edit : With this new features, resetting the character is now faster and better than just open the menu and press reset button. Now for the optional features like showing the region in the server list so i'll get myself to a lower ping servers, and some additional button for anything like dropping items. The camera bug is fixable by just open the menu but, not all experience will fix it though, still fine to do it anyway

Playing since 2016, it was the greatest game I've ever played to be honest. There's a lot of events, games and stuff. I sometimes experienced a bug that makes my screen go black when I joined a game, I still can chat with my friends they said to rejoin and it works (I dont know if its just my device problem or game problem). So yeah, hope ya can fix that.

This game is a really great game but the only problem is that sometimes (always) when you stop to do something for like a minute or two the the camera starts to move with the joystick and even if it's one finger or thumb it zomes in and out, but this is worth getting but I would recommend making more realistic vehicles for the games that do have cars and making a button that reduces lag glitchs
